import React, { useState, useContext } from 'react' import { FormContext } from '../context/FormContext' import axios from 'axios' const NewInvoice = () => { const [itemInput, setItemInput] = useState(1) const { state, dispatch } = useContext(FormContext) const [showForm, setShowForm] = useState(state) let [itemForm, setItemForm] = useState("3") console.log(itemForm); const [formValue, setFormValue] = useState({ street: "", city: "", zipCode: "", country: "", clientName: "", clientEmail: "", clientCity: "", clientZipCode: "", clientCountry: "", clientStreet: "", paymentDate: "", items: [], amount: "", }) function handleClose() { dispatch({ type: "CLOSE_MENU" }) setShowForm(false) } function handleChange(event) { setFormValue(values => ({ ...values, [event.target.name]: event.target.value })) console.log(formValue) } function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() dispatch({ type: "CLOSE_MENU" }) axios.post("http://localhost:5000/addinvoice", { formValue }) .then((res) => console.log(res)) .catch((err) => console.log(err)) } const handleAddItem = () => { setItemForm(itemForm = itemForm + 1 ) } const renderItems = () => { let i = 0 for(i; i < itemForm; i++){ return(
) } console.log(i, itemForm); } return (
{ state &&

setFormValue({ ...formValue, paymentDate: event.target.value })} value={formValue.paymentDate || ""} type="date" />
